description: Hotel Vert offers pastel-colored rooms with a private bathroom, TV and free Wi-Fi access. It is located 1.2 mi from the Mont Saint-Michel tidal island on the Normandy Coast.  Guests can enjoy regional cuisine at the Vert’s restaurant, La salicorne. The hotel’s bar, L’Equinoxe, opens onto a private terrace.  The Vert Hotel provides a 24-hour reception and private parking. There is also an on site supermarket and souvenir shop.

This Mercure is located in parkland just 1.2 mi from the abbey of Mont Saint Michel. It offers spacious rooms with attached bathroom, a restaurant and bar and plenty of free on-site parking.  The air-conditioned rooms at Mercure Mont Saint Michel are equipped with facilities for making hot drinks.  A flat-screen TV with satellite and cable channels is also provided.  The restaurant, Le Pré Salé, is famous in the area and serves delicious seafood and regional specialties. The bar, Le Normandy, offers a relaxed setting for a drink among friends.  Mercure Mont Saint Michel is 4 mi from Pontorson and 32 mi from Saint-Malo.

La Vieille Auberge is located in the medieval village of Mont-Saint-Michel, a few steps from the famous abbey. It offers free Wi-Fi, a restaurant, a terrace and hotel reception in its main house.  The rooms are divided between two annexes located high up in the village and accessible by numerous steps. One offers standard rooms in the middle of the village, overlooking the street, while the other, at the top of the village, offers rooms with a view of the bay and a terrace. All rooms have flat-screen TVs and private bathrooms with bath or shower.  The hotel also features a bar and a restaurant serving traditional French cuisine.

Le Relais Saint Michel is an hotel facing the bay of Mont Saint-Michel. All guest rooms ( except Twin Room Saint-Michel with interior view) offer a private terrace and some have panoramic views of Mont Saint-Michel.  The soundproofed rooms are comfortable and spacious. They are fully equipped with modern comforts including a mini-bar and free Wi-Fi access. Each room has private bathrooms.  The hotel’s restaurant offers traditional cuisine. Guests can enjoy a drink or a meal on the terrace, which offers views of the Mont St Michel.  A free shuttle service that stops in front of the hotel will take you to the famous landmark Mont St Michel in just 10 minutes. Safety jackets are provided for guests wishing to take a walk at night. For guests arriving by car, secured parking is available with an extra cost.

Composed of 2 different buildings, Les Terrasses Poulard is a historical property in the heart of Mont Saint-Michel and offers views of the bay, the village and the street.  Accessed by stairs, each room has a modern décor. Some rooms include large windows with bay views. They are equipped with TV and a private bathroom.  Breakfast is served at the restaurant Les Terrasses de la Baie. Once arrived at the restaurant, please go to the first floor. Alternatively, guests can enjoy a meal at the onsite La Confiance restaurant and offers meals, drinks and snacks.  Guests can enjoy a drink in the Les Terrasses Poulard’s bar. It offers a 24-hour front desk service and guests can leave their luggage at the reception.  Activities in the area include cycling, fishing and hiking and explore the island.

Hotel Gabriel is located 1 mi from Mont Saint-Michel. It offers free Wi-Fi access and rooms with attached bathroom just a 25-minute walk from the walls of the old city.  The hotel has no elevator and has rooms on the ground floor, 1st and 2nd floor for family rooms.  Each room has a TV, kettle and a private bathroom with shower and toilet.  A buffet breakfast is available every morning.  Hotel Gabriel is a 6-minute drive from the E401 motorway. Pontorson TGV Train Station has connections to Paris and is 4.5 mi away.  La Salicorne offers you authentic, vegetable, colorful, festive and eco responsible world cuisine. Le Pré Salé offers you Pré Salé lamb and semi gastronomic french cuisine.

Le Relais Du Roy is a 3-star hotel located next to the River Couesnon, just 0.9 mi from the Mont Saint-Michel and 164 feet from the free shuttle bus.  Featuring flat-screen TVs with satellite channels, a telephone and a welcome tray, each guest room at Le Relais Du Roy is decorated in a classic style. They also have a private bathroom with a bath or a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. Some of the rooms feature a balcony.  A buffet breakfast is served each morning at the hotel.  A grocery store can be found within a 3-minute walk from the hotel. The town of Pontorson is 4.3 mi away. Private parking is available with an extra cost.

Stay in a Historic Hotel at the Heart of Mont Saint-Michel.  Hôtel La Mère Poulard, located in the heart of Mont Saint-Michel, has preserved the authentic charm of traditional inns from the past. For over a century, this iconic establishment has welcomed pilgrims and travelers from around the world in a setting rich in history.  The hotel consists of three historic houses, each offering a unique atmosphere:  The Historic Inn, where the story of La Mère Poulard began.  La Maison Rouge, with its adjoining garden, providing a peaceful setting.  L’Ermitage, also known as Maison d’Annette, the final residence of the famous cook.  The rooms, with their classic style, offer breathtaking views of the bay, the Abbey, or the medieval town. They are equipped with a flat-screen TV, free Wi-Fi, and a private bathroom with a bathtub.  La Mère Poulard’s renowned restaurant invites you to savor its traditional recipes, including the famous omelet, prepared using Annette Poulard’s unique expertize since 1888.  Take advantage of your stay to explore Mont Saint-Michel and its picturesque streets, hike the surrounding trails, or discover the region by bike.  Avranches is a 23-minute drive away, and Saint-Malo is 45 minutes away.

Set amid lush greenery, just 1.2 mi from the Mont Saint-Michel, the hotel welcomes you in a warm and friendly atmosphere.  Hôtel Saint-Aubert features comfortable and very quiet rooms, surrounded by gardens full of flowers.  After a day spent exploring the Mont Saint-Michel, enjoy a delicious regional cuisine in the picturesque setting of a former farmhouse.  The helpful staff will be happy to provide you with information about the visits and the many attractions in the surrounding area.

Comfortable Accommodations: Le Duguesclin in Le Mont Saint Michel offers family rooms with private bathrooms, work desks, and free toiletries. Each room includes a TV, wardrobe, and carpeted floors.  Dining Experience: The traditional restaurant serves French cuisine with vegetarian options. Guests can enjoy lunch, dinner, and high tea in a welcoming ambiance. Breakfast includes continental and buffet options with juice, fresh pastries, and fruits.  Convenient Facilities: The hotel provides private check-in and check-out, shuttle service, and luggage storage. Additional amenities include a coffee shop, daily housekeeping, and a bar.   Mont Saint Michel Abbey is just a few steps away, while Mont Saint-Michel is a 3-minute walk. Other nearby points include the Scriptorial of Avranches and Port of Houle. Rennes–Saint-Jacques Airport is 58 mi from the hotel.

At the foot of the abbey, the Mouton Blanc Hotel, welcomes you in its historic 14th century location. Le Mouton Blanc provides comfortable rooms with a simple yet cozy decoration.  The rooms are divided in 3 buildings: one of them offers views of the Mont Saint-Michel, and the other one features medieval-style rooms.  The Mouton Blanc restaurant offers local traditional cuisine, served in the dining room or the terrace. Breakfast is served daily.  Personalized services for visits, recreation and other activities are available upon request.  Please note that the reception of the hotel Le Mouton blanc is currently closed. Please note that arrival arrangements are made at the reception of the hotel Les Terrasses Poulard.

The Auberge Saint Pierre is made up of small 14th century half-timbered houses located on the island of Mont-Saint-Michel. It combines the period charm of exposed beams with modern comforts, including a TV and free Wi-Fi.  Ideally located for visiting Mont-Saint-Michel, this hotel is on the main street which leads to the Mont-Saint-Michel abbey.  Two annexes of the hotel are located in the middle of the village and are accessible by numerous stairs.  The rooms at Auberge Saint Pierre and the annexes have a private bathroom with a bath or shower. Some rooms offer sea views.  The hotel serves a buffet breakfast daily. Traditional Norman cuisine and fish dishes are served in the authentic restaurant and you can choose to dine on site.

hotel_name: Appart Standing - La Coque d'Or - Mont-St-Michel
description: Modern Comforts: Appart Standing - La Coque d'Or in Le Mont Saint Michel offers a recently renovated apartment with free WiFi, a kitchenette, and a living room. The property includes a private entrance and a city view.  Convenient Facilities: Guests benefit from private check-in and check-out services, a shuttle, a coffee shop, family rooms, and luggage storage. Paid off-site parking is available.   Mont Saint Michel Abbey is a 2-minute walk away, and Mont Saint-Michel is just a few steps from the apartment. Other nearby points include the Scriptorial of Avranches (18 mi) and Port of Houle (30 mi).   Walking tours are available, and the property provides streaming services and a TV for guest entertainment.

Historic Setting: Chez Adèle in Le Mont Saint Michel offers a holiday home experience within a historic building. Guests enjoy sea views and a terrace, perfect for relaxation.  Comfortable Living: The property features two bedrooms and a bathroom. Amenities include a fully equipped kitchen, dining area, and a comfortable sofa. Free toiletries and a hairdryer are provided.   Located a few steps from Mont Saint Michel Abbey and a 2-minute walk to Mont Saint-Michel, Chez Adèle is ideal for exploring the area. Nearby attractions include the Scriptorial of Avranches and Port of Houle.   Guests appreciate the terrace, scenic views, and convenient location, making Chez Adèle a preferred choice for a memorable holiday.

hotel_name: Chambres d'hôtes La Rive - Le Mont Saint Michel
description: Comfortable Accommodations: Chambres d'hôtes La Rive - Le Mont Saint Michel in Ardevon offers a sun terrace, garden, and free WiFi. Guests enjoy private check-in and check-out services, a lounge, and a shared kitchen.  Modern Amenities: The property features air-conditioning, a terrace, and a private bathroom. Each room includes a kitchen, tea and coffee maker, and garden views. Additional amenities include a coffee shop, outdoor seating area, and bicycle parking.  Delicious Breakfast: A continental breakfast is served with local specialties, fresh pastries, pancakes, cheese, and juice. Special diet menus are available.  Local Attractions: Mont Saint Michel Abbey is 5.6 mi away, while the Scriptorial of Avranches is 13 mi distant. Rennes–Saint-Jacques Airport is 53 mi from the property.

Located 2.7 mi from Mont Saint Michel Abbey, Résidence Beauvoir le Mont-Saint-Michel offers self-catered holiday homes with access to a terrace, as well as a tennis court and a BBQ facilities. Free WiFi is offered.  The units provide views of the garden and come with a seating area, a washing machine, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, and a private bathroom with a hair dryer. An oven and coffee machine are also available.  At the holiday homes guests are welcome to take advantage of an indoor swimming pool.  A garden and a children's playground are provided at the property.  The nearest airport is Dinard Bretagne Airport, 34 mi from the property.

Elegant Accommodations: Etoile des Grèves in Ardevon offers a bed and breakfast with a sun terrace, garden, and free WiFi. Guests enjoy private check-in and check-out services, a lounge, outdoor seating area, picnic area, family rooms, and bicycle parking.  Comfortable Amenities: Each room features a private bathroom with a walk-in shower, hairdryer, outdoor furniture, and a TV. Additional amenities include soundproofing, electric kettle, executive lounge access, and wardrobe.  Prime Location: Located 58 mi from Rennes–Saint-Jacques Airport, the property is near Mont Saint Michel Abbey (5 mi) and Mont Saint-Michel (5 mi). Other attractions include the Scriptorial of Avranches (13 mi) and Granville Train Station (28 mi). Guests appreciate the scenic views and the friendly host.

hotel_name: Apparthôtel Mont Saint Michel - Résidence Fleurdumont
description: Résidence Fleurdumont offers pet-friendly accommodations in Beauvoir. Mont Saint Michel Abbey is 2.7 mi away. Résidence Fleurdumont also includes a seasonal outdoor pool, a tennis court and a pétanque playground. Free private parking is available on site.  Most units include a terrace or balcony. Résidence Fleurdumont features free WiFi and TV. Towels and bed linen are provided.  There is also a kitchenette, equipped with a microwave, a refrigerator and stovetop, as well as a coffee machine. A breakfast kit is provided every morning.  The nearest airport is Pleurtuit Airport, 26 mi from Résidence Fleurdumont.

Elegant Accommodations: Les Pres-Salés in Courtils offers a serene garden and terrace with stunning views. Free WiFi is available in public areas, ensuring guests stay connected.  Comfortable Amenities: The property features a shared kitchen, family rooms, and barbecue facilities. Each room includes a private bathroom with a shower and TV, providing a comfortable stay.  Convenient Location: Located 56 mi from Rennes–Saint-Jacques Airport, Les Pres-Salés is near attractions such as Mont Saint Michel Abbey (7.5 mi) and Mont Saint-Michel (7.5 mi). Free on-site private parking is provided.  Guest Favorites: Guests highly rate the property for its scenic location, delicious breakfast, and attentive host.

Composed of thoughtfully designed independent bungalows and guestrooms in the annex house of a 19th-century building, Hotel Rose offers comfortable accommodations and a peaceful atmosphere.  The residence is set in a verdant park full of trees and flowers. Some of the accommodations opens out onto the river that leads to the famous Mont Saint Michel and offer a tranquil, relaxing living space. All of the bungalows are independently ecological and can accommodate 4 people (or 5 on request).  Enjoy a tasty breakfast, a casual drink or a relaxing moment on the manor's veranda or under the shade of the trees.  Hotel Rose also features a shared living area with a piano, free Wi-Fi access, games and plenty of reading material. Nearby you can take quiet walks or bike rides and enjoy traditional and regional cuisine in one of the local restaurants.

hotel_name: Studio Le sillon malouin vue mer
description: Beachfront Location: Studio Le sillon malouin vue mer in Saint Malo offers direct beachfront access with stunning sea views. Sillon Beach is just a few steps away, while Palais du Grand Large is an 8-minute walk.  Comfortable Amenities: Guests enjoy a sun terrace, free WiFi, and free on-site private parking. The apartment features a kitchenette, balcony, washing machine, and a private bathroom with a shower.  Local Attractions: Casino Barrière Saint-Malo is 2297 feet away, National Fort a 15-minute walk, and Grand Bé 1 mi distant. Scuba diving is available in the surrounding area.  Guest Favorites: Guests highly rate the location with a view, balcony, and terrace, making it a preferred choice for relaxation and exploration.

hotel_name: T2 terrasse de charme à Rochebonne 400 m plage
description: Comfortable Accommodations: T2 terrasse de charme à Rochebonne in Saint Malo offers a one-bedroom apartment with a sun terrace, balcony, and garden. Free WiFi is available throughout the property.  Convenient Facilities: Guests can enjoy free bicycles, a coffee shop, outdoor seating area, and family rooms. Additional amenities include a washing machine, kitchen, and private check-in and check-out services.  Prime Location: Rochebonne Beach is a 6-minute walk away. Nearby attractions include Casino Barrière Saint-Malo (1.9 mi) and National Fort (2 mi). Scuba diving is available in the surroundings.  Guest Satisfaction: Highly rated for its friendly host, convenient location, and easy beach access.

Comfortable Living Space: Les Bois Flottés in Saint Malo offers a one-bedroom apartment with a living room. The property features parquet floors, a dining area, and a fully equipped kitchen with modern appliances.  Essential Facilities: Guests enjoy free WiFi, bicycle parking, and free off-site parking. Additional amenities include a washing machine, walk-in shower, and streaming services.  Prime Location: Located on a quiet street, the apartment is a 14-minute walk from Rochebonne Beach. Nearby attractions include Casino Barrière Saint-Malo (2 mi) and the National Fort (2.1 mi).   Visitors appreciate the nearby shops, convenient location, and easy access to the beach. Scuba diving is available in the surrounding area.

The Kyriad Prestige hotel is located 2.5 mi from the historic Intramuros center and the beaches.  It has free and secure parking for your vehicle.  The establishment also has a spa with heated indoor swimming pool, accessible from 3 years old, with a whirlpool bath area, water slides for the back, a sauna, a hammam, and a fitness room with 3 equipment.  Our continental breakfast is served daily in the dining room as a buffet. You can also take advantage of the coworking spaces during the day, as WIFI is available throughout the hotel.  The bar is open every day until 10:30 p.m., and a snack service is available 24 hours a day.  Our modern and refined rooms are all equipped with safes, showers in the bathrooms, and air conditioning.

Prime Location: Marguerite in Saint Malo offers a beachfront setting with Eventail Beach just a 3-minute walk away. Grand Bé lies 1640 feet nearby, while Palais du Grand Large is a 5-minute stroll. Casino Barrière Saint-Malo is 1312 feet from the apartment.  Comfortable Amenities: Guests enjoy free WiFi, a elevator, and family rooms. Paid off-site parking is available. The apartment features a washing machine, private bathroom, kitchen with modern appliances, and a dining area. Additional amenities include a TV, sofa, and parquet floors.   Solidor Tower is 1.9 mi away, while Port-Breton Park and Marina Dinard are 6.2 mi and 6.8 mi respectively. Scuba diving opportunities enhance the surrounding area. Hiking and other activities are available for guests.   Highly rated by guests, Marguerite is praised for its convenient location.

The Oceania Saint Malo hotel faces the sea and is located on Chaussée du Sillon, opposite Sillon Beach and 1476 feet from Saint-Malo Marina. It offers luxurious rooms and guests have free access to spa area and swimming pool.  Guest rooms are air-conditioned and feature parquet flooring. They include flat-screen TV, free WiFi and a spacious bathroom.  The terrace has a panoramic sea view. The open-air hot tub is located on the patio. The modern fitness room includes the latest exercise equipment and massages are offered at an extra cost.  The lounge bar in the Oceania Saint Malo offers a variety of cocktails and drinks and can accommodate private cocktail parties. It also offers a dining menu for evening meals. Breakfast is served daily.  The Oceania is 0.9 mi from the Saint-Malo Train Station and 4.3 mi from the airport. On-site parking is available. English, Spanish, German and French are spoken at reception.

Discover the rebirth of a legendary address: after three years of renovation, the Grand Hôtel de Courtoisville opens its doors just a few steps from the magnificent Sillon beach. This emblematic Belle Époque establishment invites you to enjoy a unique experience, combining the charm of history with the comfort of contemporary luxury. Nestled in a green setting, our hotel-villa offers you a haven of peace in the heart of the corsair city.   Open the doors and discover spaces of rare elegance, where every detail has been designed for your well-being. Our rooms, calm and bright, are true cocoons of serenity. They have all the modern comforts to guarantee peaceful nights, with bathrooms equipped with a bathtub or shower, a hairdryer and toiletries from major brands. You will also find bathrobes, slippers and a Nespresso coffee machine to perfect your stay.   For absolute relaxation, our Spa welcomes you in a cozy atmosphere. Let yourself be seduced by the heated indoor pool, the hammam and a menu of exclusive treatments by Sothys. The hotel restaurant, "Le 1906", promises you a gourmet getaway with refined cuisine highlighting the treasures of the sea and local products. In the evening, our bar "Le Baccara" awaits you for a signature cocktail in a cozy and warm atmosphere. Couples particularly appreciate the location and the unique atmosphere of our establishment.   The Grand Hôtel de Courtoisville is more than a destination, it is your new home in Saint-Malo.

Hotel Bristol Union is located in the heart of Saint Malo, within the city walls of the old town and 591 feet from Saint-Malo Marina. Its rooms and suites are en suite with satellite TV and free Wi-Fi internet access.  A daily breakfast service is available. It is served in the dining area or in the comfort of your guest room. The bar offers a nice place to enjoy a quiet drink or evening aperitif.  The Bristol Union benefits from a convenient location for those wishing to explore and discover Saint-Malo and the picturesque region of Brittany. Mont Saint Michel is just a 45-minute drive from the hotel.

Escale Oceania Saint-Malo is located on the seafront, facing the Sillon Beach and a 14-minute walk from Saint-Malo Train Station. It offers modern rooms, a sunny outdoor terrace and 24-hour-a-day food service.  Guest rooms feature a flat-screen TV and some of them offer a sea view. Free Wi-Fi internet access is provided.  Free of charge guests have at their disposal a PC with internet access and a printer. Bikes can be rented on site.  Breakfast is served every morning, and evening meals can be enjoyed at the hotel. Snacks are available throughout the day and packed lunches for picnics are also available.

Beachfront Location: La Conchee in Saint Malo offers direct beachfront access and stunning sea views. Pont Beach is just a 3-minute walk away, while Casino Barrière Saint-Malo lies 3.1 mi from the property.  Comfortable Accommodations: The holiday home features two bedrooms and a bathroom, equipped with a washing machine, kitchen, and free WiFi. Guests can relax on the terrace or balcony and enjoy the outdoor dining area.  Local Attractions: Nearby attractions include the National Fort and Palais du Grand Large, each 3.1 mi from the property. Other points of interest include Grand Bé at 3.7 mi and Solidor Tower at 4.3 mi.  Guest Favorites: Guests highly rate La Conchee for its location with a view, beach access, and convenient location.

This hotel with 24-hour reception is located on Saint Malo sea front, facing the beach. The property features a south-facing garden and a terrace. Saint Malo Train Station is a 15-minute walk from the hotel and the historic town center is a 7-minute walk.  Free Wi-Fi, a flat-screen TV with cable channels and private bathroom facilities are found in all rooms. Some provide a view of the sea.  A buffet breakfast composed of sweet and savory dishes such as eggs, fruit salad, yogurts and juices is served every day. Pastries baked on site and fresh French Madeleine cakes are also on offer, as well as a hot beverage and a piece of fruit to take away. Outside of regular breakfast hours guests can also enjoy a lighter option, available from 04:00.  Guests are invited to enjoy a drink on the terrace or in the hotel bar and snacks are available 24-hours a day.  The Palais des Congrès is a 5-minute walk away and Dinard is 7.5 mi from the hotel. Saint-Malo Marina is 0.6 mi from the property.

Spacious Accommodations: Manoir du Pont Gris Saint-Malo in Saint Malo offers a spacious holiday home with four bedrooms and two bathrooms. The property features family rooms and a private entrance, ensuring comfort for all guests.  Modern Amenities: Guests enjoy free WiFi, a fully equipped kitchen, washing machine, and a dining area. Additional amenities include a TV, microwave, dishwasher, and a seating area, catering to all needs.  Convenient Location: Located a 9-minute walk from Bas-Sablons Beach and 0.8 mi from Solidor Tower, the property is close to attractions such as Grand Bé and Casino Barrière Saint-Malo. Scuba diving is available in the surrounding area.  Guest Services: The holiday home provides concierge service, bike hire, and multilingual reception staff speaking German, English, Spanish, French, Italian, and Vietnamese. Guests appreciate the convenient location and spacious rooms.

Comfortable Living: La Suite Nolyvan in Saint Malo offers a one-bedroom apartment with a living room. The ground-floor unit features a garden and terrace, complemented by free WiFi.  Modern Amenities: Guests enjoy amenities such as bathrobes, streaming services, washing machine, and a fully equipped kitchen with a barbecue. Additional features include a dining area, sofa bed, and tiled floors.  Prime Location: Sillon Beach is a 4-minute walk away, while Palais du Grand Large lies 1.2 mi from the property. Nearby attractions include Casino Barrière Saint-Malo and National Fort, each 1.2 mi distant.  Activities and Surroundings: The apartment provides access to fishing, walking tours, cycling, and scuba diving. Guests can also enjoy activities like sailing and kayaking.

This hotel is located in the seaside resort of Saint-Malo, 164 feet from the beach. Free Wi-Fi access and a TV are provided in the nonsmoking guest rooms.  Each guest room has a contemporary décor and the private bathrooms are fitted with a shower.  A breakfast buffet is served every morning in the restaurant.  Guests can enjoy a drink in the bar at La Rotonde.  Free public parking is possible nearby and the hotel is just 1.2 mi from Saint-Malo Train Station. Dinard-Pleurtuit Airport is 5 mi from the hotel and the famous Mont St-Michel is a 50-minute drive away.

Hôtel Les Charmettes - Saint Malo, on the seafront in the Brittany town of Saint-Malo, offers direct beach access and a guests can sample a drink at the beach bar. Each guest room has a private bathroom, flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi.  All seaside room feature a balcony, while other rooms look onto the courtyard. All rooms come with a nautical theme.  The hotel Hôtel Les Charmettes - Saint Malo serves a continental breakfast, which can be enjoyed in the dining room or in the comfort of your room. The on-site restaurant serves traditional meals including seafood platters. Guests can also relax on the hotel terrace, overlooking the sea.  The Sillon beach is located directly in front of the hotel and the Saint Malo Train Station is 1.2 mi away. Guests can reach Saint-Malo city center within 30 minutes by walk.

Located to the south of Saint-Malo, Résidence Pierre & Vacances Ty Mat is set in a garden and offers self-catering apartments near the shops and the beach. The heated outdoor pool is open from June to September.  Accommodations is in a studio featuring a fully equipped kitchenette with dishwasher, private bathrooms and a TV. All rooms are accessible by elevator.  Guests can borrow board games and books for free. Private on-site parking is available for an additional charge, subject to availability.  Résidence Pierre & Vacances Ty Mat is located between the harbor and the walled town. Many activities are possible nearby including tennis, golf and horse riding.  Green Key-awarded.

Comfortable Accommodations: Sézam Appart’Hôtel Saint-Malo in Saint Malo offers 3-star aparthotel rooms with kitchenettes, private bathrooms, and modern amenities. Each room includes a tea and coffee maker, refrigerator, free toiletries, and a TV.  Essential Facilities: Guests enjoy free WiFi, breakfast in the room, and room service. Additional amenities include a dining table, microwave, oven, and toaster. The aparthotel provides soundproofing, parquet floors, and a seating area.   Located less than 0.6 mi from Sillon Beach and near attractions such as Palais du Grand Large and Casino Barrière Saint-Malo. Public transport options nearby enhance convenience.   Guests can enjoy fishing, scuba diving, and other activities in the surrounding area.

Beachfront Location: T2 Confort Sillon St Malo in Saint Malo offers direct beachfront access and stunning garden views. Sillon Beach is a 9-minute walk away, while Palais du Grand Large lies 1.1 mi nearby.  Comfortable Accommodations: The apartment features one bedroom, two bathrooms, and a spacious living room. Amenities include a kitchenette, washing machine, and free WiFi.  Convenient Services: Guests benefit from private check-in and check-out, a 24-hour front desk, and family rooms. Free off-site parking is available, along with executive lounge access.   Nearby attractions include Casino Barrière Saint-Malo (1.2 mi) and National Fort (1.3 mi). Scuba diving is popular in the surrounding area.

Offering a snack bar and free WiFi, ibis Styles Saint Malo Port is located in Saint Malo, less than a 10-minute walk from the sandy beaches and 0.6 mi from Saint-Malo Train Station. Emerald Coast is located 1.2 mi from the property.  Each of the contemporary rooms features a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a wardrobe. They all have a private bathroom complete with a hairdryer.  At ibis Styles Saint Malo Port you will find a 24-hour front desk and a bar. Other facilities offered at the property include luggage storage and a private parking with a supplement.  The hotel is only 0.6 mi from the Ferry Terminal du Naye and close to the pier, providing access to the Channel Islands. It is also a 5-minute walk from the Olympic swimming pool of Saint Malo. Rennes Airport is 42 mi away and the famous Mont Saint-Michel is less than an hour away by car. Dinard is 6.2 mi away.

Comfortable Accommodations: Manoir Le Castel & Villa Beaumaris in Saint Malo offers a spacious apartment with a sun terrace and a garden. Free WiFi is available throughout the property.  Modern Amenities: The apartment includes a private bathroom, kitchen, and garden views. Additional features include a coffee machine, dishwasher, and soundproofing.  Convenient Location: Located an 8-minute walk from Rochebonne Beach, the property is close to attractions such as Casino Barrière Saint-Malo (2.4 mi) and National Fort (2.4 mi). Free on-site private parking is provided.   Guests can enjoy an outdoor play area, electric vehicle charging station, and bicycle parking. Express check-in and check-out services are available.

Historic Setting: B&B Nathalie in Bayeux offers a unique stay within a historic building. The property features tiled and parquet floors, providing a charming atmosphere.  Modern Amenities: Guests enjoy free WiFi, a terrace, and a lounge. Additional facilities include a games room, outdoor seating area, and free off-site parking.  Comfortable Accommodations: Rooms offer private bathrooms with showers, tea and coffee makers, and city views. Breakfast includes continental and buffet options with local specialties, juice, and fruits.  Local Attractions: Cathedrale Noter Dame de Bayeux is a 2-minute walk away, while the Baron Gerard Museum lies 656 feet nearby. The Museum of the Bayeux Tapestry is a 7-minute walk. Caen–Carpiquet Airport is 17 mi from the property.

Between Caen and Cherbourg, near the exit 36 on the N13 motorway, Hotel Ibis Budget Bayeux is just 8.1 mi to the D-Day landing beaches. It offers 24-hour reception and air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi Internet access.  Guest rooms are soundproofed and equipped with satellite TV. All rooms are serviced by a elevator and have their own bathroom with shower. You can enjoy a buffet breakfast. Snacks and drinks are available from the vending machines.   Free private parking is provided on site making this hotel an ideal base for those exploring Normandy by car. The American cemetery is 19 mi from the property and the Bayeux Tapestry Museum is an 8-minute drive away.

hotel_name: Tiny house au cœur de Bayeux
description: Comfortable Living Space: Tiny house au cœur de Bayeux in Bayeux offers a one-bedroom apartment with a living room. The property features a balcony, terrace, and garden views.  Modern Amenities: Guests enjoy free WiFi, a kitchenette, and a dining area. Additional facilities include a sun terrace, outdoor seating, and a picnic area.  Convenient Location: Located 17 mi from Caen–Carpiquet Airport, the apartment is a short walk from the Museum of the Bayeux Tapestry and Cathedrale Noter Dame de Bayeux. Nearby attractions include the Baron Gerard Museum and D-Day Museum.  Guest Satisfaction: Highly rated for its convenient location, friendly host, and beautiful garden.

hotel_name: Le Clos de la Chapelle Bayeux
description: Comfortable Accommodations: Le Clos de la Chapelle Bayeux in Bayeux offers adults-only guest house accommodations with private bathrooms, air-conditioning, and parquet floors. Each room includes a work desk, seating area, and garden or city views.  Exceptional Facilities: Guests enjoy a sun terrace, hot tub, and outdoor seating area. Free WiFi is available in public areas, ensuring connectivity during the stay. A Strategic Location in the Heart of Rouen Located on the banks of the Seine, a few minutes' walk from the historic center of Rouen, our hotel enjoys an ideal central location for discovering the city's cultural and architectural riches. From the hotel, you can easily access the main museums and monuments on foot or by public transport:  Museum of Fine Arts (15-minute walk): one of the richest collections in France, with works by Monet, Delacroix, Modigliani, and Gérard David.  Historial Joan of Arc: a multimedia immersion into the story of the Maid of Orléans, a must-see for history buffs.  Museum of Natural History: ideal for families, one of the oldest museums in France.  Rouen Cathedral (12-minute walk): a masterpiece of Gothic architecture, immortalized by Monet.  Gros-Horloge, Saint-Maclou Church, and Aître Saint-Maclou are all within walking distance.  Close to universities and training centers The B&B Hôtel Rouen Center is also an excellent choice for students, teachers, researchers, or visiting parents:  University of Rouen Normandy – Pasteur Campus: less than 10 minutes on foot  Faculty of Law, Literature, and Humanities: accessible by bus or on foot  INSA Rouen, NEOMA Business School, CESI, ESIGELEC: easily accessible by public transport or car  CHU Charles Nicolle & University Hospital: less than 15 minutes by public transport  Practical on-site services  Lougne bar available from October 20th Free high-speed Wi-Fi throughout the hotel  Vending machines with snacks and drinks  Pets welcome (surcharge)  Elevator  100% nonsmoking hotel  24-hour reception  Good value for money in the heart of the city  The B&B Hôtel Rouen Center offers you a An excellent compromise between comfort, location, and price. The Best Western Citadelle is located in the historic city center of Besançon, a 5-minute walk from the Doubs River and the Citadelle. Free Wi-Fi is available in the rooms. The small parking area, which includes 10 spaces, is only accessible by reservation for a supplementary fee of 15 EUR per space. An electric charging station is available on request and subject to availability at a rate of €25.  Please note that our parking area is only suitable for standard-sized vehicles (a small courtyard in the city center).  The establishment is 3.1 mi from the Micropolis convention center. Public parking is available on-site for an extra charge. Please contact the establishment directly if you wish to reserve a parking space.  If you are traveling with pets, please contact the establishment directly to inquire about the pet policies. It is essential to contact the establishment.  You will be accommodated in one of our 41 rooms located across various buildings as follows:  • The Main Building with elevator access, where we have 21 rooms. • The Annex, also in the main building, without elevator access. • The Hotel Pavilion, where we have 9 rooms, without an elevator. • The Workshop, with 2 spacious rooms specially adapted for guests with reduced mobility.  If you have a preference, feel free to let us know during your reservation. While we cannot guarantee, we promise to always do our best to accommodate the various requests of our guests.

Campanile Dijon Center-Gare Hotel*** Restaurant — Renovated Rooms Available  Are you visiting Dijon for work or exploring the region? Treat yourself to a stay at the Campanile Dijon Center-Gare hotel and restaurant, which offers comfortable rooms and delicious, seasonal cuisine.  Located just steps from Dijon-Ville train station and the historic city center, your Campanile Dijon Center-Gare hotel welcomes you 24/7.  Start your day with an all-you-can-eat buffet breakfast, enjoy lunch or dinner in the restaurant, and unwind at the bar or lounge.  Your Campanile Dijon Center-Gare Hotel  Travel with peace of mind: our services help you plan your stay with complete peace of mind.  Central Location and Convenient Access  The central location of your hotel is ideal for getting around by public transport or exploring the entirely pedestrianized historic city center. Several tram and bus stops, the free DiviaCity shuttle, and a Vélodi self-service bike station are all within a two-minute walk of the hotel.  The hotel is just 328 feet from the TGV train station, perfect for train travelers, even those with luggage. For those who prefer to drive, street parking is available nearby, or you can park in the EFFIA long-term parking lot at the station, where our guests receive a 50% discount.  Flexible stays for every occasion  Our 3-star hotel is dedicated to providing you with a quality stay in the heart of Dijon.  We welcome you for all occasions: business trips, group travel, romantic weekends, or stopovers on your holiday journey.  Breakfast, lunch, half-board options… choose the services you need.  For your business events, book a seminar room and work with our sales team to create a stay perfectly tailored to your needs: welcome coffee, refreshments, catering, or accommodations.  100% Cozy Rooms  Our 83 rooms, renovated in 2026, have been designed to ensure your complete comfort.  We offer double rooms for relaxation, twin rooms for more independence, as well as triple and family rooms for traveling with others. For even greater comfort, choose our superior double or twin rooms.  Because reduced mobility shouldn't mean compromise, our three accessible rooms meet the latest accessibility standards.  Each room features a thick, comfortable mattress, air conditioning, a private bathroom with shower or bathtub and hairdryer, a work area, a smart TV, and a complimentary tray with tea, coffee, and herbal tea.  The added bonus of the superior rooms? An ultra-relaxing rain shower and more space for optimal comfort.  For work or entertainment, free and secure high-speed Wi-Fi is available throughout the hotel.  Explore Dijon, the capital of Burgundy  The city of Dijon is brimming with activities for all tastes, easily accessible on foot or by public transport from the hotel.  Food lovers will appreciate the International City of Gastronomy, the historic mustard shops, and the gingerbread factories.  Art and history enthusiasts will discover the city's many museums, churches, theaters, cinemas, and concert halls.  Children and adults alike can learn, have fun, or relax at the Arquebuse Botanical Garden, with its planetarium and natural history museum, or enjoy outdoor activities in the Parc de la Colombière.  Shopping enthusiasts will enjoy strolling through the pedestrian streets of the city center, browsing major brands and artisan boutiques, or at the Toison d’Or shopping center.  Those in a hurry will appreciate the Owl Trail, an approximately one-hour walk that guides you through the must-see sights of the historic center. Before setting off, remember to pick up your illustrated guide at the tourist office.  Need advice? The tourist office staff are always available to help you.  Dining  Every day, from 5:00 a.m. to 10:00 a.m., fuel up with our all-you-can-eat breakfast buffet.  Hot drinks, pastries, a variety of breads, cold cuts, cheeses by the slice, dairy products, fresh fruit, scrambled eggs, and much more: everything is designed to satisfy both young and old.  Because travel is also about good food, enjoy every meal in our friendly restaurant, Le Comptoir. Share a lunch or dinner with family, friends, or colleagues.  On the menu: seasonal French dishes, brasserie classics, and Burgundian specialties.  The Campanile Dijon Center-Gare hotel restaurant welcomes you for breakfast, lunch, and dinner.

Apparthotel Le Hüb Grenoble – Confort et accessibilité au cœur des Alpes  Idéalement situé à seulement 5 minutes à pied de la gare et du quartier Europole, et à 5 minutes en tramway de la Presqu’île scientifique, l’Apparthotel Le Hüb Grenoble est l’adresse parfaite pour un séjour professionnel ou en famille en toute sérénité. Le center-ville est accessible en seulement 15 minutes, offrant un emplacement stratégique pour découvrir Grenoble et ses environs.  L’établissement propose des hébergements modernes et entièrement équipés, alliant confort et autonomie. Chaque logement dispose de la climatisation, d’une cuisine complète avec coin repas, d’une télévision à écran plat ainsi que d’une salle de bains privative avec baignoire et sèche-cheveux. Un micro-ondes, un réfrigérateur, une bouilloire et une machine à café sont également mis à disposition pour un séjour en toute commodité.  Les clients bénéficient d’une connection Wi-Fi gratuite dans tout l’établissement ainsi que d’un parking privé sur place. Chaque matin, un petit-déjeuner buffet varié est proposé pour bien commencer la journée. Pour un moment de détente, une agréable terrasse avec transats est accessible, idéale pour se relaxer après une journée de travail ou d’exploration.  Avec les premières stations de ski à seulement 45 minutes en voiture ou en transports en commun, l’Apparthotel Le Hüb Grenoble constitue un point de départ idéal pour rejoindre la vallée du Grésivaudan, explorer les trois massifs emblématiques – Vercors, Chartreuse et Belledonne – et profiter d’activités de plein air telles que la randonnée ou le ski. Que vous soyez en déplacement professionnel, en vacances ou de passage pour découvrir la région, noter établissement vous offre un cadre chaleureux et fonctionnel, parfaitement adapté à vos besoins.

description: Residence Montempo Appart'Hôtel Lyon Cite Internationale offers ApartHotel accommodations next to the Parc de la Tête d'Or, in the heart of the Congress Center area and a 15-minute drive from the center of Lyon. The Rhône river runs outside the residence and guests can enjoy the sun terrace with views of the park. Free WiFi is available throughout the property.  All air-conditioned studios and apartments at the Residence Montempo Appart'Hôtel Lyon Cite Internationale have a fully equipped kitchenette with a microwave a dishwasher and a dining area. Each unit has a flat-screen satellite TV and a safety deposit box. All units also have a private bathroom with a shower, toilet and a hairdryer.  Residence Montempo serves a buffet breakfast daily. Guests can enjoy their breakfast in the dining area.  It offers a 24-hour front desk service.  Sights nearby include the Contemporary Art Museum and the Palais des Congrès de Lyon. Lyon Part-Dieu Train Station is 10 minutes away by bus.

Comfortable Accommodations: YASI Hostel in Lyon offers a garden, terrace, bar, and free WiFi. Guests enjoy air-conditioning, soundproofing, and private or shared bathrooms.  Amenities and Services: The hostel features a lounge, 24-hour front desk, concierge service, shared kitchen, evening entertainment, coffee shop, outdoor seating area, games room, standup comedy, culture classes, full-day security, bicycle parking, express check-in and check-out, bike hire, and luggage storage.  Prime Location: Located 14 mi from Lyon Saint Exupery Airport, the hostel is a 13-minute walk from Part-Dieu Train Station. Nearby attractions include Musée Miniature et Cinéma (2.5 mi), Museum of Fine Arts of Lyon (2.9 mi), and Lyon Perrache Train Station (3.1 mi). An ice-skating rink is in the surroundings.   Guests highly rate the bar, public transport options, and bed comfort.

Located in Lyon, 656 feet from Musée de la Resistance, MEININGER Hotel Lyon Center Berthelot features accommodations with a bar, private parking, a shared lounge and a terrace. Fourvière is 1.9 mi away.  All rooms boast a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a private bathroom.  The hotel offers a continental buffet breakfast.  There is a 24-hour front desk, a shared kitchen. The terrace is only open during the breakfast service.  The Museum of Fine Arts of Lyon is 1.8 mi from MEININGER Hotel Lyon Center Berthelot, while Musée des Confluences is 1.5 mi from the property. Perrache Train Station is 0.8 mi away. The nearest airport is Lyon - Saint Exupery Airport, 16 mi from the accommodations.

Comfortable Living Space: Le patio AIL in Lyon offers a one-bedroom apartment with a terrace and garden. Guests enjoy free WiFi, a fully equipped kitchen, and a comfortable bedroom.  Modern Amenities: The apartment includes a bathroom with a shower, a work desk, and a dining table. Additional features include a coffee machine, microwave, dishwasher, and TV.  Convenient Location: Located 1.8 mi from the Museum of Fine Arts of Lyon and 2.1 mi from Fourvière Roman Theater, the property is 17 mi from Lyon Saint Exupery Airport. Nearby attractions include the Basilica of Noter-Dame de Fourvière and Musée Miniature et Cinéma.

hotel_name: BnGo I L'évasion Coeur de Ville I 2 chambres, 6 personnes
description: Spacious Accommodations: BnGo I L'évasion Coeur de Ville I 2 chambres, 6 personnes in Lyon offers a spacious apartment with two bedrooms and a living room. The property includes family rooms, ensuring comfort for all guests.  Modern Amenities: Guests enjoy free WiFi, a fully equipped kitchen with a coffee machine, dishwasher, and microwave. Additional amenities include a washing machine, dining area, sofa bed, and TV.   Located in the city center, the apartment is a short walk from Musée Miniature et Cinéma (14 minutes) and Museum of Fine Arts of Lyon (984 feet). Lyon Saint Exupery Airport is 17 mi away. An ice-skating rink is nearby.

HO36 Hostel Lyon property is located in Lyon, a 15-minute walk from Place Bellecour. Guillotière metro stop is 1148 feet from the hostal, which provides direct access to both Part Dieu and Perrache train stations in 10 minutes. Free WiFi is provided throughout the property.  The property offers hotel rooms as well as beds in a dormitory. It features a shared lounge with sofas, books and a shared dining room with refrigerators and microwaves. There is also a restaurant and bar.  Opera National de Lyon an Musee des Beaux-Arts are 1.1 mi from the property. The nearest airport is Lyon - Saint Exupery Airport, 12 mi from HO36 Hostel Lyons.

Séjours & Affaires Lyon St-Nicolas is located in central Lyon, 2461 feet from Part Dieu Train Station. The studios and apartments offer equipped kitchenettes and free WiFi access.  Each studio has a desk, a private bathroom and a TV, and the kitchenettes are equipped with cooking facilities, a fridge and a microwave.  The property offers free weekly cleaning and a meeting room. Hotel services available for an additional cost include parking and laundry facilities.  Place Bellecour and Lyon's Old Town can be accessed directly via metro from Garibaldi Metro Stop, 2297 feet away.

Located on the banks of the Saone River, Hôtel Lyon Métropole & Spa offers accommodations with 24-hour reception and free WiFi.  All rooms offer air-conditioning, a flat-screen TV and an private bathroom with a separate toilet. Some units have a seating and dining area, kitchenette, refrigerator, stovetop and a microwave.  A buffet breakfast is served every morning at the hotel, as well as a bar.  The wellness center includes a swimming pool, spa, sauna, hot tub and a fitness center. Guests can also rent bikes nearby.  Lyon City Center is 1.9 mi from the hotel. Cuire Metro Station is a 20-minute walk away.

hotel_name: Novotel Lyon Centre-Confluence Bord de Saone
description: Featuring a terrace and a bar with panoramic river views, Novotel Lyon Center-Confluence Bord de Saone is set in the center of Lyon on the banks of the Saône River. A Vaporetto Station is located just outside the hotel. This river boat can take you to Lyon's old town via the Saône river for a surcharge. The Musée des Confluences is 3117 feet away.  With free WiFi and satellite TV, each spacious room is air-conditioned and soundproofed. Some rooms have an iPod docking station.  International cuisine is proposed in the hotel’s restaurant, and breakfast is served daily. Meals are served in the restaurant or al fresco on the terrace.  Novotel Lyon Center-Confluence Bord de Saone provides private parking with an extra cost and the A6 and A7 motorways are 984 feet away. The hotel is located next to the Confluence Commercial Center and 2625 feet from Lyon Perrache Train Station.

Comfortable Accommodations: Pullman Lyon in Lyon offers spacious rooms with private bathrooms, bathrobes, and free WiFi. Each room includes a work desk, soundproofing, and a TV.  Dining Experience: The modern restaurant serves Latin American cuisine with vegetarian and gluten-free options. Breakfast includes local specialties, fresh pastries, and a variety of beverages.  Amenities and Services: Guests can enjoy a terrace, fitness room, and a 24-hour front desk. Additional services include room service, concierge, and electric vehicle charging.  Prime Location: Located 2 minutes from Part-Dieu Train Station, the hotel is near attractions such as the Museum of Fine Arts (1.7 mi) and Lyon Perrache Train Station (2.6 mi). An ice-skating rink is in the surroundings. Lyon Saint Exupery Airport is 20 mi away.

hotel_name: Campanile Lyon Centre - Berges du Rhône
description: Campanile Lyon Center - Berges du Rhône offers free WiFi access. It is just a 2-minute walk from the Guillotière Metro Station and an 8-minute drive from the Part-Dieu Train Station.  Set over 8 floors, rooms at Campanile are decorated in a simple style and feature air conditioning. Please note that only the TV in the bar broadcasts satellite channels and Canal+. The private bathrooms are complete with a bath or shower and a hairdryer. Four of the guest rooms are adapted for wheelchair access.  A buffet breakfast is served every morning at the hotel. Additional facilities include a 24-hour reception, 2 meeting rooms and an express check-in service. Free newspapers are available.  The hotel is a 15-minute walk from Place Bellecour and Rue de la République, Lyon’s main shopping street. The A6 and A7 are a 5-minute drive away.

Hôtel Charlemagne by Happyculture is located in central Lyon, a 5-minute walk from the Lyon Perrache TGV and Metro stations. It offers air-conditioned accommodations with free Wi-Fi internet access.  Each room at the Hôtel Charlemagne by Happyculture is equipped with satellite TV and private bathrooms. Some rooms also have a private balcony.  Breakfast buffet is available daily and the Hôtel Charlemagne by Happyculture’s restaurant, La Bibliothèque, serves regional cuisine. Guests can enjoy a drink at the Le Mélèze bar, which features an outdoor floral terrace.  Place Bellecour is a 20-minute walk from the hotel, and the Noter Dame de Fourvière Basilica is 1.2 mi away. The Suchet tram stop is just 394 feet from the hotel.

hotel_name: Appart'hôtel Odalys City - Bioparc Lyon Est
description: Located in a residential area in Lyon, Appart'hôtel Odalys City - Bioparc Lyon Est offers nonsmoking air-conditioned accommodations with free WiFi. Laennec Metro Station is a 6-minute walk away, giving access to Place Bellecour via an 11-minute journey on metro line D.  Each apartment offers a kitchenette including a stovetop, a fridge and a dishwasher. There is a flat-screen TV with cable channels, and the private bathroom has a hairdryer.  Breakfast is served every morning in the dining room, which opens onto a shaded terrace, while drinks and snacks are available from a vending machine. At an extra cost, guests may use photocopying, fax and laundry facilities. There is also an ironing service.  The property offers underground parking facilities at an extra cost, and there is free public parking at a location nearby, subject to availability. Part Dieu Business District is 2.5 mi from the property, while Eurexpo is a 15-minute drive away. Lyon-Saint Exupéry Airport is 16 mi from Appart'hôtel Odalys City - Bioparc Lyon Est.

Offering a year-round heated outdoor pool, Fourvière Hôtel is located on Fourvière Hill above the Old Town of Lyon, offering views over the city. The hotel has a sun terrace, hot tub and hammam. Free WiFi is provided throughout.  All rooms have air conditioning, soundproofing and hardwood floors. There is a flat-screen TV with cable and satellite channels. The private bathroom offers a hairdryer and free toiletries. Some rooms offer city or garden views.  A Lyon-style boules court is available.  Restaurant Les Téléphones serves bistronomic cuisine overlooking the cloisters. You can relax with a hot drink at Le KFE or follow the hotel’s own “traboule” passageway to a glass of wine at the Les Collections.  The Basilica of Noter-Dame de Fourviere is 1969 feet from the property, while the Museum of Fine Arts of Lyon is a 9-minute drive away. Lyon - Saint Exupery Airport is 22 mi from Fourvière Hôtel. Subject to availability, private parking is possible on site for an additional charge.

hotel_name: Hôtel Chromatics & Restaurant Hill Club by HappyCulture
description: Hôtel Chromatics & Restaurant Hill Club by HappyCulture is located on Lyon’s Presqu’île, a 6-minute walk from Perrache train and metro station. It has an on-site restaurant, as well as a shaded terrace and garden. Free WiFi is available throughout the property.  All the guest rooms at the Hôtel Chromatics & Restaurant Hill Club by HappyCulture Perrache are air conditioned and have a private bathroom, and flat-screen TV with satellite channels.  A Buffet Breakfast is available daily. Guests can relax with a drink during the evenings in the hotel bar or on the terrace.  Set in the heart of the city, the hotel is 2625 feet from Place Carnot and the E15/A6 motorway. The old town and Saint Jean Cathedral are 1.6 mi away.  The tramway stop Suchet is 656 feet from the property. The property offers a preferential rate at the public parking, available a 4-minute walk away.

Welcome to the Crowne Plaza Lyon Hotel, where conviviality and comfort come together to offer you an unforgettable experience. Located in the heart of the 6th district, within the Cité Internationale, this establishment is the ideal place to relax and enjoy all the wonders of Lyon, 10 minutes from the city center and the Part-Dieu train station. Public transport and bicycles can be rented in front of the hotel, while car and bicycle parking is at the foot of the property (fees apply). When you enter, you are immediately greeted by a warm and modern decor. Whether you are here for business or pleasure,the Crowne Plaza Lyon hotel is the ideal place for you, the caring and dedicated team is here to meet all your needs. The spacious and bright rooms offer you all the necessary comforts: safe, ironing board, selection of coffee and tea, as well as free Wifi and access to a Chromecast service. Personalize your stay and treat yourself to a room with a shower, bath or balcony. A preference for a high floor? it is also possible! Finally, connecting family rooms and suites will be an undeniable asset for the organization of your family trip or weekend. The hotel is also known for the quality of its bedding, a good night’s sleep awaits you. The restaurant - bar offers a friendly experience with its superb room, its central bar and its large terrace facing the park. Throughout the day, the Chef prepares a varied menu with Italian flavors: dishes to share, daily menu... you will be delighted! Enjoy a refreshing cocktail and antipasti and enjoy a relaxing moment. If you are looking for something to do after a busy day, you can choose between a fitness center, a walk along the Rhone River or a race in the park with its entrance facing the hotel. Whether you’re here on business or for pleasure

Located in Lyon, Mama Shelter Lyon offers a 24-hour front desk, a restaurant and suites. It is 984 feet from Jean-Macé Metro Station, which leads directly to Stade de Gerland and Lyon-Part-Dieu Train Station.  Suites at Mama Shelter Lyon feature free WiFi, TV channels, AirPlay system and chromecast. The private bathroom is complete with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. Some suites are suitable for disabled guests.  A buffet breakfast can be enjoyed every morning and the on-site restaurant serves French cuisine. Each suite has a kitchenette with a microwave and a minifridge.  This property is 2953 feet from the Rhône River, a 25-minute walk from Place Bellecour and close to the Musée des Confluences. Private parking is available on site at an additional cost.

Thank you for choosing B&B HOME Lyon Center Berthelot for your stay. We look forward to welcoming you.  We are located in Lyon, 820 feet from the T2 Route de Vienne tram stop and 1640 feet from the T4 Jet d'Eau - Mendès France tram stop. Perrache Train Station and Part-Dieu Train Station are a 12-minute drive away.  All studios and apartments feature air conditioning, a private bathroom, elevator access, and a kitchenette equipped with a fridge, microwave, and tea/coffee making facilities. You may request kitchenware at the reception desk.  Our wellness area, featuring a jacuzzi, sauna, and sensory shower, is open daily from 17:00 (5 p.m.) to 21:00 (9 p.m.). If you require access outside these hours, please contact reception to arrange an alternative time. We also offer a massage service (additional charge) upon reservation at least 48 hours in advance.  If you require a parking space. We have two car parks (one underground and one outside), both available for an extra charge.  If you require parking and expect to arrive outside of reception opening hours, please call us in advance to ensure you have access to the car park.

Located 0.6 mi from Moustiers-Sainte-Marie, this hotel has a large collection of objects from the 1950's and paintings by Maurice Vagh-Weinmann. It also offers a seasonal outdoor pool and a furnished terrace.  Each air-conditioned and soundproofed room is individually decorated and has free Wi-Fi access, a TV and a private bathroom. Some rooms have a balcony and views over the valley or the garden.  A continental breakfast is served daily. Guests can enjoy a drink at the hotel’s bar or on 1 of the 2 terraces with views of the garden.  Activities in the nearby area include cycling, hiking and paragliding. Nautical activities and fishing is possible by Lac de Sainte-Croix, 3.1 mi from the hotel. Les Gorges du Verdon is also 3.1 mi away.

Located in the heart of an olive grove, 2625 ft from the village of Moustiers, La Clorinde is ideally located to discover the Gorges du Verdon (0.9 mi) and to appreciate the beauty of the lake of Sainte Croix (1.9 mi) and the lavender fields.  The large, bright, quiet, air-conditioned rooms have a view on the garden and the mountains.  Breakfast (3 formulas), dinner, prepared with local products, will be served on the terrace and will make you appreciate the charms of the Provencal gastronomy.  We propose you, free of charge, a parking and a very powerful Wifi access. A laundry service is also available.  We speak 3 languages: French, English, Spanish  All your requests are welcome. La Clorinde, a haven of peace, will do everything possible to make your stay in Provence an unforgettable experience.

hotel_name: Résidence Odalys La Licorne de Haute Provence
description: Located 1640 feet from the village and 2625 feet from the thermal baths,Résidence Odalys La Licorne de Haute Provence consists of 3 small complexes. It includes 3 swimming pools and relaxation facilities.  The apartments at Résidence Odalys La Licorne de Haute Provence are equipped with a kitchenette including hotplates, a microwave, an oven, and a dishwasher.  The apartments located on the ground floor boast a private garden and all others feature their own terrace.  Résidence Odalys La Licorne de Haute Provence features 2 outdoor swimming pools and 1 indoor swimming pool. Sports-enthusiasts will appreciate the residence’s fitness center.  You can also enjoy unwinding in the spa with its hot tub, hammam and sauna.

Located 0.6 mi from Moustiers-Sainte-Marie village center, Le Colombier is just 3.1 mi from Sainte-Croix Lake. This Provencal house features a swim spa, 2 hot tubs and tennis court. Free WiFi is provided.  Le Colombier offers air-conditioned rooms with panoramic views of the valley or Moustiers rocks. Decorated with Provencal-style furniture, they each have a flat-screen TV with satellite channels.  The Colombier provides free private parking and a garage for cars, bicycles and motorcycles. Local leisure activities nearby include rafting, paragliding and canyoning.

Located in Verdon Regional Park, Les Canyons du Verdon features an outdoor swimming pool with sunbeds, a garden and pétanque facilities. Castillon Lake is just 2.8 mi away. Free WiFi is available throughout the property.  Decorated in fresh colors, all rooms feature a private entrance, while some include a balcony, pool views or garden view and a TV. They are complete with an private bathroom.  A breakfast buffet is offered at the hotel. Castellane village is conveniently located 820 feet away, allowing easy access to restaurants, bars and shops.  A conference room is available on request. It can accommodate up to 20 people.  Noter-Dame du Roc Chapel is only a 15-minute walk away and Saint-André-les-Alpes is a 20-minute drive from the hotel. Free Wi-Fi access is available in reception and free private parking is possible on site. Free storage for motorbikes is available on site.

Modern Comforts: L'Establoun in Saint-Martin-de-Brômes offers a recently renovated apartment with air-conditioning, a terrace, and a kitchenette. Guests enjoy free WiFi, a private bathroom, and a fully equipped kitchen.  Outdoor Amenities: The property features a sun terrace, open-air bath, and a seasonal outdoor swimming pool. Additional facilities include a coffee shop, outdoor seating area, picnic area, and free on-site private parking.  Convenient Location: Located 60 mi from Marseille Provence Airport, L'Establoun is near attractions such as ITER / Cadarache (15 mi), Golf du Luberon (17 mi), and Digne Golf Course (30 mi). Walking tours and hiking are available. Highly rated by guests.

Comfortable Accommodations: Appartements Hameau du Port in Esparron-de-Verdon offers a sun terrace, open-air bath, and free WiFi. The apartment features air-conditioning, a washing machine, and a private bathroom.  Modern Amenities: Guests can enjoy a fully equipped kitchen with a coffee machine, dishwasher, and microwave. Additional amenities include a dining area, outdoor seating, and barbecue facilities.  Outdoor Spaces: The property offers a terrace and balcony with lake views. An outdoor dining area provides a pleasant setting for relaxation.  Local Attractions: Located 63 mi from Toulon - Hyeres Airport, the apartment is 19 mi from ITER / Cadarache and 22 mi from Golf du Luberon. Boating activities are available in the surroundings.

Elegant Accommodations: Villa Fautea Verdon in Sainte-Croix-de-Verdon offers a sun terrace and a seasonal outdoor swimming pool. Guests enjoy free WiFi throughout the property.  Comfortable Amenities: The villa features air-conditioning, a kitchenette, and a private bathroom. Additional amenities include a washing machine, balcony, and outdoor seating area.  Leisure Activities: Guests can participate in film nights, walking tours, bike tours, hiking, and cycling. The property also provides bicycle parking and barbecue facilities.  Nearby Attractions: Digne Golf Course is 28 mi away, and Marseille Provence Airport is 73 mi from the villa.

hotel_name: LES BASTIDES DE CHANTERAINE Bungalows, Lodges & Spa
description: Accommodations Features: LES BASTIDES DE CHANTERAINE Bungalows, Lodges & Spa in Aiguines offers a spa, garden, terrace, open-air bath, restaurant, bar, seasonal outdoor swimming pool, and free WiFi.  Facilities and Services: Guests enjoy wellness packages, badminton equipment hire, a coffee shop, outdoor seating area, picnic area, family rooms, and breakfast in the room. Free on-site private parking is available.  Dining Experience: The family-friendly restaurant serves Mediterranean cuisine with continental and à la carte breakfast options including fresh pastries and juice.  Activities and Surroundings: Activities include yoga classes and walking tours. The property is highly rated for its lakes, scenic views, and proximity to an active nature-centric trip. Toulon - Hyeres Airport is 70 mi away.

This campground is set on the river bank, located in the village of Castellane, within a 5-minute drive of the Verdon Gorge. Free WiFi is provided in public areas and the property has a table tennis table as well as a boules pitch.  A TV with cable channels and a private terrace feature in all the chalets and mobile homes, which have a simple décor with wooden furnishings. The private bathrooms are fitted with a shower. Located at the edge of the forest, all accommodations types offer mountain views.  Guests can enjoy a variety of relaxing massages onsite and upon request.  A microwave, fridge and hotplates are included in each kitchenette at Camping La Ferme de Castellane. There are barbecue facilities at the property.  The property has a heated swimming pool as well as unusual accommodations.  Additional services include laundry facilities and there is a children’s playground. You can watch Canal+ channels in the TV room, which also has a library or play table football and board games.  The center of Castellane is 1.4 mi from the campground and the city of Grasse is 40 mi away. It is the starting point of the GR4 hiking path and there is a free, private parking available on site.  Unlimited coffee, tea and hot chocolate is served in the morning.

hotel_name: Club Vacances Bleues Domaine de Château Laval
description: Club Vacances Bleues Domaine de Château Laval is located in the thermal resort of Gréoux-les-Bains, between the Luberon Natural Regional Park and the Verdon Gorges and 36 mi from Aix-en-Provence. The 3-star resort features a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, an indoor pool, 3 tennis courts, free WiFi access and a 24-hour reception.  All guest rooms in the resort are equipped with a flat-screen TV. Guests can also stay in Mobile Homes which each have a kitchenette and dining area. Free WiFi is provided in each room and mobil home.  A continental breakfast is available every morning at the property. Guests can enjoy a meal at the on-site restaurant, which serves a variety of French and Provencal dishes.  Other onsite facilities include a children's playground, an educational farm and a volleyball court. Tree climbing tracks and horse riding lessons are available on site. The area is popular for hiking and cycling.

Comfortable Accommodations: Auberge du Bourguet in Brenon offers family rooms with private bathrooms, mountain and river views, and modern amenities including free toiletries and work desks.  Dining Experience: The family-friendly restaurant serves French, Mediterranean, pizza, and barbecue grill cuisines in a traditional ambiance. Guests can also enjoy meals on the terrace.  Convenient Facilities: The hotel features a lounge, electric vehicle charging station, and free on-site parking. Additional amenities include a hairdryer, shower, and wardrobe.  Nearby Attractions: Located 52 mi from Nice Côte d'Azur Airport, the property is 12 mi from Château de Taulane Golf Course and 30 mi from Saint-Endréol Golf Club.

CAMPING PANORAMIQUE du VERDON is located in the heart of the Verdon Gorges, just 0.6 mi from Castellane. It offers 1 heated swimming pool for children, a heated infinity pool (please check opening dates). Free WiFi is available throughout the property.  The mobile homes at CAMPING PANORAMIQUE du VERDON feature a private terrace with panoramic views of Castellane. Each one also includes a kitchenette, which is complete with a stove and a fridge-freezer. Bed linen and towels are provided.  You can order French pastries and fresh bread 24 hours in advance. Local shops, bakeries and restaurants can all be found in the center of Castellane.  Free private parking is provided on site. You may also choose to buy local honey, spices and crafts from the weekly market in the town center.

hotel_name: Camping RCN Les Collines de Castellane
description: Camping RCN Les Collines de Castellane is 12 mi from Lac de Castillon and 4 mi from Castellane, the gateway to the Gorges du Verdon region. It offers a seasonal outdoor swimming pool with slides and massage jets, a restaurant, a pizzeria and a snack bar.  The mobile homes, chalets and luxury tents at Les Collines have an equipped kitchen, a bathroom with a shower and bedrooms equipped with pillows and covers. Each unit has a furnished terrace.  Guests can play boules, basketball, football and volleyball at Camping RCN Les Collines de Castellane and there are outdoor fitness facilities. For an extra fee you can play tennis.  The area is popular for rafting, canyoning and horse riding.

Elegant Accommodations: Le 10 18 hôtel restaurant in Sainte-Croix-de-Verdon offers a swimming pool with a view, sun terrace, open-air bath, restaurant, bar, and free WiFi. Private check-in and check-out services, family rooms, and full-day security ensure a comfortable stay.  Comfortable Amenities: Guests enjoy private bathrooms with baths, bidets, and showers. Additional amenities include air-conditioning, terraces, balconies with lake or mountain views, and free toiletries. The hotel provides free on-site private parking and a coffee shop.  Dining Experience: The family-friendly restaurant serves French cuisine with lunch, dinner, and cocktails in a traditional, modern, and romantic ambiance. Breakfast includes warm dishes, fresh pastries, cheese, fruits, and juice. Marseille Provence Airport is 12 mi away.

hotel_name: "Les Lauriers" chambre indépendante avec terrasse privée
description: Chambre D'Hôtes "Les Lauriers" chambre indépendante avec terrasse privée offers accommodations in Moustiers-Sainte-Marie.  Each room has a flat-screen TV. You will find a kettle in the room. Rooms have a private bathroom.  Gréoux-les-Bains is 17 mi from Chambre D'Hôtes "Les Lauriers" chambre indépendante avec terrasse privée, while Manosque is 22 mi from the property. The nearest airport is Côte d'Azur Airport, 51 mi from the property.

Set in the Verdon Regional Park, this hotel features a swimming pool and a shaded terrace in the garden. Regional dishes are served in the hotel’s restaurant.  The soundproofed guest rooms have a flat-screen TV and they offer a view. Each room is individually decorated and the private bathrooms include free toiletries. A hairdryer is available upon request.  A buffet breakfast is prepared daily at the Hôtel La Bonne Auberge.  The Gorges du Verdon is located 3.1 mi away and private parking is available in the on-site garage.

Located in Les-Salles-sur-Verdon, Studi-Hôtel Résidence Plein Voile is just 656 feet from Sainte-Croix Lake and offers a garden and terrace. The Gorges du Verdon are 6.2 mi away.  Decorated in a simple style, all rooms feature a wardrobe and private bathroom with free toiletries, while some also offer a balcony and views of the lake. Guest have access to the refrigerator.  A continental breakfast can be served each morning at Résidence Plein Voile. A bar, pizzeria and restaurant are conveniently located just 164 feet from the property.  Watersports activities can be found 656 feet away at the lake and Moustiers Sainte-Marie is 7.5 mi away. Free Wi-Fi access is available in the public areas and free public parking is possible at a location nearby.

hotel_name: Camping Rives du Lac de Sainte Croix
description: Comfortable Accommodations: Camping Rives du Lac de Sainte Croix in Bauduen offers family rooms with air-conditioning, kitchenettes, and private bathrooms. Each unit includes a terrace, dining area, and modern amenities such as a refrigerator, microwave, and TV.  Leisure Facilities: Guests can relax on the terrace or enjoy the bar, perfect for socializing. The property features a swimming pool, outdoor dining area, and a seating area, ensuring a pleasant stay.   Located 68 mi from Toulon - Hyeres Airport and 31 mi from Saint-Endréol Golf Club, the camping provides easy access to local attractions. Free on-site private parking is available for guests.   Highly rated for its convenience for an active nature-centric trip, lakes, and property cleanliness, Camping Rives du Lac de Sainte Croix offers a comfortable and enjoyable stay.

Located in Les Salles-sur-Verdon, Auberge des Salles features a terrace with panoramic views of Lake de Sainte-Croix and the surrounding Verdon Natural Park. Hiking, fishing, and swimming are within 10 minutes' walk of the property.  Rooms have a flat-screen TV with cable channels and private bathrooms with either a bath or shower and a toilet. Some rooms have balconies with lake views and other rooms overlook the village and surrounding hills. A kettle is available upon request subject to availability.  The restaurant has a panoramic terrace on the lake of Sainte-Croix serving dinner everyday.  A buffet breakfast with hot drinks, orange juice, croissants, fresh bread with jams, honey and butter is served daily for a supplement. There is a bar on site.  The entrance to the Verdon Gorge is 3.7 mi away and the village of Moustiers-Sainte-Marie is a 20-minute drive away. Les Arcs-Draguignan Train Station is 34 mi away and the Hyeres Airport is 71 mi away. Free private parking and free WiFi are available at the property.

hotel_name: Studio idéal séjour en amoureux rez de jardin proche plage
description: Beachfront Location: Studio idéal séjour en amoureux rez de jardin proche plage in Bormes-les-Mimosas offers direct beachfront access and a spacious terrace. Guests can relax by the sea and enjoy garden views.  Comfortable Amenities: The apartment features two bedrooms and a bathroom, equipped with a washing machine, kitchen, and free WiFi. Additional amenities include a dining table, sofa bed, and a private entrance.   Faviere is a 6-minute walk away, while La Favière lies 1312 feet nearby. This is our guests' favorite part of Toulouse, according to independent reviews.
