Prime Location: Located 6.2 mi from La Rochelle - Ile de Re Airport, the property is a short walk from Minimes and close to attractions such as the Lighthouse at the End of the World and La Rochelle University. Highly rated for its beachfront access and convenient location.

Set in the La Rochelle City Center district in La Rochelle, 1640 feet from Parc Expo de La Rochelle, B&B HOTEL La Rochelle Center features air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. Private and secure parking is available on site at an extra cost.  Rooms come with a flat-screen TV. Each room is equipped with a private bathroom equipped with a shower.  You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property.  L'Espace Encan is 1969 feet from B&B HOTEL La Rochelle Center, while La Rochelle Grosse Cloche is 2625 feet from the property. The nearest airport is La Rochelle - Ile de Re Airport, 2.5 mi from the property.

The Résidence New Rochelle, located right next to the La Rochelle marina and just 656 feet from the beach, welcomes you to a pleasant setting with an outdoor swimming pool, garden, and terrace.  For the past two years, the residence has been undergoing a renovation program to offer its guests studios with modern comfort and improved amenities.  The renovated studios feature contemporary kitchenettes, more spacious and modern bathrooms, and additional amenities such as hairdryers and towel warmers for a more comfortable and functional stay.  Standard studios, simpler and more economical, are also available for travelers seeking a practical, budget-friendly option.  The residence offers an outdoor swimming pool, a terrace, and free, secure bicycle storage. Numerous restaurants are within walking distance and open for lunch and dinner, along with an excellent bakery/tea room and various shops.  La Rochelle city center is a 10-minute bus ride or a pleasant walk along the port. Private parking is available, and the N11 is a 10-minute drive away.

Located in La Rochelle, beside Port des Minimes, this residence offers a covered, heated pool and a well being center. It is a 5-minute walk from the Aquarium and the Vieux Port. On-site parking is available, at a surcharge, based on availability.  Each soundproofed apartment and studio at the Lagrange Appart'Hotel l’Escale Marine has a fully equipped kitchenette with a microwave grill oven, a private bathroom and free WiFi. All apartment and suites are accessible by a elevator.  Massages treatments are available at a surcharge and upon request. It is 0.6 mi from La Rochelle Ville Train station, and 5 mi from the La Rochelle- île de Ré Airport.

hotel_name: Hôtel Le Transatlantique - Lycée Hôtelier La Rochelle
description: Located in La Rochelle, 1.6 mi from Parc Expo de La Rochelle,  The hotel and catering school property is around 3.1 mi from La Rochelle Grosse Horloge, 0.9 mi from Musée Maritime de La Rochelle and 1.1 mi from La Rochelle Aquarium. The property is nonsmoking and is set 0.9 mi from L'Espace Encan.  At the hotel, the rooms are equipped with a desk, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. All guest rooms will provide guests with a wardrobe and a kettle.  Continental and à la carte breakfast options are available every morning at Lycée Hôtelier La Rochelle. There are also 2 onsite restaurants with a daily menu, where guests can dine upon reservation.  Popular points of interest near the accommodations include The Minimes Marina, Museum of Automata and La Rochelle University. The nearest airport is La Rochelle - Ile de Re Airport, 6.8 mi from Hôtel Transatlantique - Lycée Hôtelier La Rochelle.

This Appart'city is a 10-minute walk from La Rochelle Train Station and 15 minutes from the Old Port and the Old Town. It offers contemporary accommodations with a seating area and an LCD TV.  The apartments and studios at Appart'City Classic La Rochelle Centre have free WiFi internet access. Some offer a private balcony and all feature a kitchenette with a microwave and a fridge.  A buffet breakfast is served at the residence and is composed of various breads, including gluten-free bread, pastries, fresh and hot beverages. Fresh fruit, as well as cheeses and yogurts are also provided. Guests can also buy drinks and snacks at the reception.  Outdoor and underground parking is possible at Appart’city and La Rochelle Airport is a 15-minute drive away. Guests may also choose to visit Ile de Ré, which is just 9.3 mi away.

Located in the lively Saint Nicolas district in La Rochelle, this hotel is surrounded by antique dealers, bars and cafés. It offers free Wi-Fi and a conservatory with large sofas and tropical plants.  The air-conditioned guest rooms each have a flat-screen TV with canal+ and satellite channels.  A buffet breakfast featuring hot and fresh items is served daily in the conservatory. A continental breakfast can also be delivered directly to guests’ rooms. Local drinks, tea and coffee can be enjoyed in the bar.  Limited private secured parking can be booked at an extra cost, upon availability. The maximum height is 1m90 and the width of the parking spaces is about 6.6 ft.  Saint Nicolas Tower that guards the entrance to the old port is 1804 feet from the hotel. La Rochelle Train Station is 2297 feet away.

hotel_name: - Le petit Rochelais - Centre Vieux Port
description: Prime Location: Le petit Rochelais - Center Vieux Port is located in La Rochelle city center, offering beachfront access and free WiFi. Conveniently located less than 0.6 mi from La Rochelle Train Station and 3.7 mi from La Rochelle - Ile de Re Airport.  Comfortable Amenities: The apartment features one bedroom, one bathroom, and a living room. Guests enjoy a fully equipped kitchen with a coffee machine, microwave, and oven. Additional amenities include streaming services, a seating area, and a private entrance.

Nestled in the heart of La Rochelle and set in an 18th-century building, Maison des Ambassadeurs is just a 5-minute walk from the Old Harbor and offers a 24-hour front desk as well as a concierge service.  Featuring a high end décor, each room and suite at Maison des Ambassadeurs has an private bathroom with free toiletries.  In the evening, guests can sip a drink at the piano bar or on the property’s terrace. Guests can also relax in the hotel’s lounges or along its outdoor dipping pool.  La Rochelle Aquarium and the Beach are just 0.9 mi from the hotel, while Ile-de-Ré Bridge is a 15-minute drive away. Charging stations for electric cars are available at this property.

hotel_name: Grand studio à deux pas du Vieux Port
description: Prime City Center Location: Grand studio à deux pas du Vieux Port is located in La Rochelle city center, offering easy access to key attractions. Concurrence Beach lies less than 0.6 mi away, while La Rochelle Train Station is an 11-minute walk.  Comfortable Amenities: The apartment features free WiFi in public areas, a washing machine, kitchen with a refrigerator, microwave, and tea and coffee maker. A TV provides entertainment for guests.   Guests can explore La Rochelle Grosse Horloge (656 feet), Saint-Sauveur Church (a few steps), and Parc des Expositions de la Rochelle (15-minute walk). The La Rochelle – Ile de Re Airport is 3.7 mi from the property.   Visitors appreciate the convenient and central location, making it a preferred choice for stays in La Rochelle.

Comfortable Accommodations: L'Armada, proche gare, LR139 in Montyon offers three bedrooms and a bathroom. The holiday home includes a fully equipped kitchen with a coffee machine, dishwasher, and microwave. Guests can relax in the garden or stay connected with free WiFi.  Convenient Amenities: The property features a washing machine, dining table, and TV. Additional amenities include a refrigerator, oven, stovetop, and toaster. A private entrance ensures privacy and security.   Located 5 mi from La Rochelle - Ile de Re Airport, the holiday home is an 18-minute walk from Plage Du Roux. Nearby attractions include La Rochelle Train Station (15-minute walk), Musée Maritime de La Rochelle (less than 0.6 mi), and La Rochelle Aquarium (17-minute walk).

Located in La Rochelle, this Pierre & Vacances residence is a 5-minute walk from the Old Harbor and 984 feet from the TGV Train Station. It has a heated indoor swimming pool and a terrace.  The Pierre & Vacances Center offers studio apartments with a lounge area and a flat-screen TV. Each studio has a kitchenette equipped with a dishwasher, microwave and an electric coffee-maker.  The residence is serviced by a elevator and facilities are available for guests with reduced mobility.  Elevators are not accessible to people with reduced mobility. Our team is here to help you find the best alternative  The Residence Pierre & Vacances Center is an ideal base for discovering La Rochelle and guests can enjoy a boat trip to the Île de Ré and Fort Boyard. The beach is a 15-minute walk from the hotel. Subject to availability, paid parking is available upon reservation and for an extra charge.  Please note that the swimming pool is open from 09:00 until 19:00 daily.

hotel_name: Hôtel Les Gens de Mer La Rochelle
description: Located 492 feet from the railway station and 984 feet from the Vieux Port, Hotel Les Gens de Mer is located in La Rochelle.  Set in a beautiful white house dating back from  1950, Hotel Les Gens de Mer features 48 comfortable rooms, including 30 brand new rooms. The rooms are available at a reasonable price both for single nights or on a weekly basis.  The hotel offers 2 meeting rooms for 15 and 50 people. The team can organize your seminaries and group lunches on demand.  Free Wi-Fi is available throughout and the hotel is located 328 feet from the new congress center and the Aquarium.

hotel_name: La Casa de Pape, Hypercentre, LR138
description: Spacious Holiday Home in La Rochelle: La Casa de Pape offers a spacious holiday home in La Rochelle city center. The property features four bedrooms and two bathrooms, ensuring ample space for all guests.  Modern Amenities: Guests enjoy free WiFi, a fully equipped kitchen with a coffee machine, microwave, dishwasher, and oven. Additional amenities include a washing machine, TV, and a comfortable bath with a shower.  Convenient Location: Located 2.5 mi from La Rochelle - Ile de Re Airport, the holiday home is a short walk from Concurrence Beach (2953 feet) and La Rochelle Cathedral (1312 feet). Nearby attractions include La Rochelle Train Station (0.9 mi) and Charruyer Park (1312 feet).
